      Fired when a new frame of a segue animation has been generated.

      Fired to indicate that an animation has rendered its last frame and is now complete.

    • Uses of AnimatedSegue in com.defano.jsegue.renderers

      Subclasses of AnimatedSegue in com.defano.jsegue.renderers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractShrinkEffect 
      class  AbstractZoomEffect 
      class  BarnDoorCloseEffect
      The destination image slides in the from the left/right obscuring the source image.
      class  BarnDoorOpenEffect
      The source image is split horizontally and each side slides out left/right to expose the destination.
      class  BlindsEffect
      Destination appears in "louvered" horizontal stripes.
      class  CheckerboardEffect
      Destination image appears over the source in a 8x8 matrix.
      class  DissolveEffect
      Cross-dissolve from source to destination.
      class  IrisCloseEffect
      The source image collapses over the destination in a circular aperture.
      class  IrisOpenEffect
      The destination image expands over the source in a circular aperture.
      class  PlainEffect
      A no-op transition that simply renders the source image.
      class  ScrollDownEffect
      Scroll from top to bottom.
      class  ScrollLeftEffect
      Scroll from right to left.
      class  ScrollRightEffect
      Scroll from left to right.
      class  ScrollUpEffect
      Scroll from bottom to top.
      class  ShrinkToBottomEffect
      The source image shrinks downward exposing the destination.
      class  ShrinkToCenterEffect
      The source image shrinks from the center of the screen exposing the destination.
      class  ShrinkToTopEffect
      The source image shrinks upward exposing the destination.
      class  StretchFromBottomEffect
      The destination image grows from the bottom obscuring the source underneath it.
      class  StretchFromCenterEffect
      The destination image grows from the center of the screen obscuring the source underneath it.
      class  StretchFromTopEffect
      The destination image grows from the top obscuring the source underneath it.
      class  WipeDownEffect
      Slides the destination image over the source from top to bottom.
      class  WipeLeftEffect
      Slides the destination image over the source from right to left.
      class  WipeRightEffect
      Slides the destination image over the source from left to right.
      class  WipeUpEffect
      Slides the destination image over the source from bottom to top.
      class  ZoomInEffect
      The source image collapses over the destination in a rectangle aperture.
      class  ZoomOutEffect
      The destination image expands over the source in a rectangle aperture.
